title: 解数独 (Sudoku Solver)
content: 思路: // @Title: 解数独 (Sudoku Solver) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-21 18:56:14 // @Runtime: 6 ms // @Memory: 40 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public void solveSudoku(char[][] board) { dfs(board, board.length, 0,0); } private boolean dfs(char[][] board, int n, int row, int column) { for (int i = row; i < n; i++) { for (int j = i==row?column:0; j < n; j++) { if (board[i][j] != '.') { continue; } for (int k = 1; k <= 9; k++) { char c = (char) (k + '0'); if (isValid(i, j, n, c, board)) { board[i][j] = c; if (dfs(board, n, i,j)) { return true; } board[i][j] = '.'; } } return false; } } return true; } private boolean isValid(int row, int column, int n, char val, char[][] board) { // 检查行 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { if (val == board[row][i] ) { return false; } } // 检查列 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { if (val == board[i][column]) { return false; } } // 九宫格 for (int i = row / 3 * 3; i < row / 3 * 3 + 3; i++) { for (int j = column / 3 * 3; j < column / 3 * 3 + 3; j++) { if (val == board[i][j]) { return false; } } } return true; } }
